search_results.title: John Holloway (sociologist)
search_results.snippet: John Holloway (born 1947) is an Irish Marxist lawyer, sociologist and philosopher, whose work is closely associated with the Zapatista movement in Mexico.

search_results.title: John Holloway
search_results.snippet: John Holloway has published widely on Marxist theory, on the Zapatista movement and on the new forms of anti-capitalist struggle. His book Change the World ...

search_results.title: Prof John Holloway
search_results.snippet: Professor John Holloway is based at the Institute for Humanities and Social Sciences at the Autonomous University of Puebla, Mexico.
